Top Gun 'Communicating' Challenge

Yes, Koose, I know the finger - Charlie Kerman

This is not a competitive challenge, there are no scoreboards.

All you have to do is this:

and post a screenshot below.

Good luck!

==========

Clarifications:

  • I did this stock but if you choose to use a mod please just acknowledge that in your submission!
  • The aircraft should both be jet powered.
  • The lower aircraft should either be identical OR the same size (in length) or smaller.
  • The upper aircraft should cast a shadow somewhere on the centre fuselage of the lower aircraft (hint - fly at midday).
  • Weapons are optional.
  • 4g negative dive is optional. MiG 28 also optional.

Edited October 5, 2015 by The_Rocketeer

No takers, huh?

Gimme some feedback, was it too tough or just not interesting? Was it the name, cos... ya know... 'communicating' is a difficult word to make exciting!

This took a while to pull off and I found it pretty tough but also rewarding, hence throwing it out there as a challenge.
